books.title: The Teachings of Don Juan
books.author: Carlos Castaneda
books.description: A story of a remarkable journey: the first awesome steps on the road to becoming a 'man of knowledge'

reviews.text: "Extraordinary in every sense of the word." ― The New York Times
Must read to understand the path of a warrior -Franklin
It sucks!! --theNegativeFamily

books.title: The Bridge Across Forever
books.author: Richard Bach
books.description: Richard Bach espouses the idea that you create your own reality.

reviews.text: It's romantic, intriguing, and, the best of Richard Bach!--Franklin
Bad, just bad -Juki

books.title: Master The Law of Attraction: Create Your Reality
books.author: Aurora Skye
books.description: Is a comprehensive guide to harnessing the power of the Law of Attraction and manifesting your desires

reviews.text: It's practical tips, step-by-step exercises, and real-life examples, this book is the ultimate resource for anyone looking to transform their life -Franklin
Techniques for enhancing your manifestation abilities -anonymous
The importance of self-care in the manifestation process -Frank
Advanced visualization techniques to manifest your desires -Francisco
The science behind the Law of Attraction and how it works -Frank
stupid nonsense book -Julio

books.title: Autobiography of a Yogi
books.author: Paramhansa Yogananda
books.description: First hand account of his life experiences in India includes childhood revelations, stories of his visits to saints and masters in India, and long-secret teachings of yoga and Self-realization that he first made available to the Western reader.

reviews.text: Very hard to understand -Frank
weird book -Lay
Need to read twice to understand the first chapter -Gloria

books.title: The Book of Unusual Knowledge
books.author: Publications International Ltd.
books.description: Expand your knowledge on a range of topics, including the animal kingdom, art, sports, technology, history, politics, the universe, and much, much more!

reviews.text: Some useful information, others not so much but all of it completely captivating
crazy book -Frank

books.title: Ageless Wisdom: A Treasury of Quotes to Motivate & Inspire
books.author: J.S. Felts
books.description: This compilation of quotes is not meant to be the largest collection, but the wisest, which shares the greatest of thoughts

reviews.text: Great book by put together by an even greater man! Keep it on my desk to reference all the time! --	WILLIAM T.
Not bad but not great -Frank

books.title: Energy Teachings of The Three: Guidance and Practices to Open Your Heart and Heal Your Mind
books.author: David T. Kyle
books.description: The Energy Teachings of The Three was dictated unexpectedly to the author by three entities during an initiation in Peru in 2012 where he had been in training for several years learning the Andean shamanic healing traditions. The teachings are based on the principles and practices of energy healing combining different chakra patterns so you can live in the world with the energy of love and presence as the focus of your life.

reviews.text: Profound and timely insights and practices for these turbulent times. -Alberto Villoldo
waste my time reading this book -Frank

books.title: Heal Using Intuition And Energy: Discover Mental and Emotional Roots of Health Issues
books.author: Carrie Suwal
books.description: You are going to receive answers, healing, and integrate with your higher self throughout the practices in the book. YOU will be the healer of your life.
books.review: I really enjoyed this book. I have read many books but found some new ideas for me to use. Thank you Carrie.

reviews.text: was like she connected to my soul.
I really enjoyed this book. I have read many books but found some new ideas for me to use. Thank you Carrie.
How can people understand this crap -Betty

books.title: The Medicine Bag: Shamanic Rituals & Ceremonies for Personal Transformation
books.author: don Jose Ruiz
books.description: Introduces and explains a wealth of these shamanic rituals and ceremonies, and provides a detailed and accessible guide to performing them on your own.

reviews.text: This book was too simplified.
I have loved learning from this author and book. Beautifully put together and beautiful rituals that can be used to gain a closer connection to spirit and self.-Frank
bad bad bad -Hella

books.title: Me Talk Pretty One Day
books.author: David Sedaris
books.description: A recent transplant to Paris, humorist David Sedaris, bestselling author of "Naked", presents a collection of his strongest work yet, including the title story about his hilarious attempt to learn French.

reviews.text: author’s childhood memories were quite entertaining -Frank
Not bad -Vanessa

books.title: The Four Agreements: A Practical Guide to Personal Freedom (A Toltec Wisdom Book)
books.author: Don Miguel Ruiz
books.description: Reveals the source of self-limiting beliefs that rob us of joy and create needless suffering. Based on ancient Toltec wisdom, The Four Agreements offer a powerful code of conduct that can rapidly transform our lives to a new experience of freedom, true happiness, and love.

reviews.text: Great book to read in two days -Frank
